text: At least it went out with a bang — in more ways than one. Though it will never see the light of day again at ABC, Roseanne finished the 2017 - 18 season as the second most - watched comedy, behind The Big Bang Theory. ( Roseanne ’ s performance was even better among adults 18 - 49 : It was the No. 1 comedy in that demo. ) So how did the other shows do on the broadcast networks? Here were the top 50 most popular ones from the 2017 - 18 season.
